scripts.build: bun run build:rqb && bun run build:compat
scripts.build:compat: bun run build:antd && bun run build:bootstrap && bun run build:bulma && bun run build:chakra && bun run build:dnd && bun run build:fluent && bun run build:mantine && bun run build:material && bun run build:native && bun run build:tremor
scripts.build:concurrent: concurrently --timings --max-processes 14 --prefix-colors "#0958d9,#712cf9,#00d1b2,#81e6d9,#4078c0,#7fba00,#339af0,#007fff,#61dafb,#60a5fa" --names antd,bootstrap,bulma,chakra,dnd,fluent,mantine,material,native,tremor bun:build:antd bun:build:bootstrap bun:build:bulma bun:build:chakra bun:build:dnd bun:build:fluent bun:build:mantine bun:build:material bun:build:native bun:build:tremor
scripts.checkall: bun install --frozen-lockfile && concurrently --group --names pretty,lint,build --prefix-colors "green,#4b32c3,#82a7dd" bun:pretty-check bun:lint bun:build && concurrently --group --timings --prefix-colors "#663399,#3178c6,green,gray" --names attw,typecheck,test,website bun:are-the-types-wrong bun:typecheck bun:test bun:website:build
scripts.test: concurrently --group --timings --names sqlite,jsonlogic,jsonata,postgres,jest "bun test dbquery.sqlite" "bun test dbquery.jsonlogic" "bun test dbquery.jsonata" "bun test dbquery.postgres" jest
scripts.typecheck: concurrently --timings --max-processes 14 --prefix-colors "#0958d9,#712cf9,#00d1b2,#81e6d9,#4078c0,#7fba00,#339af0,#007fff,#61dafb,#82a7dd,#60a5fa,darkgray,gray,blue" --names antd,bootstrap,bulma,chakra,dnd,fluent,mantine,material,native,rqb,tremor,utils,examples,website bun:typecheck:antd bun:typecheck:bootstrap bun:typecheck:bulma bun:typecheck:chakra bun:typecheck:dnd bun:typecheck:fluent bun:typecheck:mantine bun:typecheck:material bun:typecheck:native bun:typecheck:rqb bun:typecheck:tremor bun:typecheck:utils bun:typecheck:examples bun:typecheck:website
scripts.are-the-types-wrong: bun run attw:rqb && bun run attw:antd && bun run attw:bootstrap && bun run attw:bulma && bun run attw:chakra && bun run attw:dnd && bun run attw:fluent && bun run attw:mantine && bun run attw:material && bun run attw:native && bun run attw:tremor
scripts.reset-deps: rm -rf node_modules packages/*/node_modules website/node_modules bun.lockb && bun install
scripts.version: bun version.ts && bun install && concurrently --timings --group --names examples,packages --prefix-colors "green,#82a7dd" bun:generate-examples bun:build && concurrently "git add examples packages website/package.json bun.lockb"
scripts.website:clearrun: bun run --filter website clear && bun run --filter website start
scripts.website:build: bun run --filter website clear && bun run --filter website build
